casebody.data:
Decker, Exrx., et al„ Appellees, v. CNA Insurance Company et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Decker v. CNA Ins. Co. (1991), 61 Ohio St.3d 1201.]

(No. 90-1392 Submitted May 15, 1991 Decided June 26, 1991.) Ralph L. Oates, Scanlon & Gearinger Co., L.P.A., and Timothy F. Scanlon, for appellees. Gallagher, Sharp, Fulton & Norman, John B. Robertson and Gary L. Nicholson, for appellants. Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.

Moyer, C.J., Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent and would reverse the judgment of the court of appeals.
